ygData.subject: Re: Bank and Farie Dragons
ygData.msgSnippet: ... This happens on the eight older machines in our lab.  We think it s a video card problem.  It happens when a bat, a fae drake, or a gargoyle is on your
ygData.messageBody:
>2 cp)I don't know if it's Norrath, Karma or the Gods, but I crash about a
>third of the time when dealing with Fae Drakes. Sometimes during combat,
>sometimes after a kill, sometimes if they're just on my screen! No other
>creature has had this effect on me. Has anyone else seen this?

This happens on the eight older machines in our lab. We think it's a video
card problem. It happens when a bat, a fae drake, or a gargoyle is on your
screen. Everything completely locks up, and we have to reboot the machine.

When we got some other machines that didn't have this problem, one of our
players went on a rampage slaughtering every fae drake he could find (he
was high enough level that they were all green to him) as revenge for the
number of times they had locked up his machine.

- Windsong Wanderer, bard on Solusek Ro
